name: Double RaceCard Pack
description:
This card is the perfect tool to highlight racial inequality for african-americans. Whether at the office, on the street, in the mall, or at press time, let the unaware racist know when they’ve crossed the line. That includes such situations but not limited to: The latest OJ Simpson Las Vegas fiasco, the Don Imus incident, Michael Vick’s Kennel of Horror or the Duane “Dog” Chapman’s tirade against his son’s girlfriend. Show them, Hand them, or toss them at your offender. Use it like a referee flag to let them know that their foul comments and/or actions will not be tolerated.

	The pack includes 5 4”x6” white Throw RaceCards and 5 black Throw RaceCards. Each is printed with Satin finish with gloss UV detail.

name: Black RaceCard Pack
description:
This card is the perfect tool to highlight racial inequality for african-americans. Whether at the office, on the street, in the mall, or at press time, let the unaware racist know when they’ve crossed the line. That includes such situations but not limited to: Michael “Kramer” Richards , the Don Imus incident, or the Duane “Dog” Chapman’s tirade against his son’s black girlfriend. Show them, Hand them, or toss them at your offender. Use it like a referee flag to let them know that their foul comments and/or actions will not be tolerated.

name: White RaceCard Pack
description:
Are you tired of being blamed for the detriment of all minorities? Growing weary of being gawked at by surprised on-lookers with your rhythmic dance moves? Wondering why black people think that you had it made on easy street? Well… This card is the perfect tool to highlight your stance on racial issues leaning towards the majority rule. Whether at the office, on the street, in the mall, or at press time, let the unaware racist know when they’ve crossed the line. This is great for debating such instances including but not limited to: The latest OJ Simpson Las Vegas fiasco, the overblown Don Imus incident, or Michael Vick’s Kennel of Horror. Show them, Hand them, or toss them at your offender. Use it like a referee flag to let them know that their foul attitudes and/or actions will not be tolerated.

	The pack includes 5 4”x6” white Throw RaceCards. Each is printed with Satin finish with gloss UV detail.

name: Low Joker Card on 13x19 Watercolor Paper
description: Mr. 3000 himself pointing a love pistol, with a heart on the handle, at the object of his affection. The style is a nod to classic illustrator Norman Rockwell. All 11×17 pieces are printed on Watercolor paper with 99 year archive life.
